meanings.definition: Decorated or embellished, especially with food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The cake was beautifully garnished with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The salad was garnished with a slice of lemon and a sprig of parsley.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream sundae looked like a garnished masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was a garnished display of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The room was garnished with festive decorations for the party.

meanings.definition: Adorned or trimmed, as with a garnish.
meanings.sent1: The cocktail was garnished with a cherry on top.
meanings.sent2: The dish was garnished with a sprinkle of herbs for added flavor.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked quite garnished with its new bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a garnished paradise of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The cupcake was garnished with a tiny edible flower.

meanings.definition: Enhanced or improved, as with additional details or elements.
meanings.sent1: The story was garnished with vivid descriptions that brought it to life.
meanings.sent2: The painting was garnished with a touch of gold leaf for a luxurious look.
meanings.sent3: The joke was garnished with a funny sound effect at the end.
meanings.sent4: The presentation was a garnished affair with interactive elements.
meanings.sent5: The performance was garnished with a surprise guest appearance.
